description: This course addresses the first part of Miguel de Cervantes’s Don Quijote de la Mancha, which consists of 52 chapters. In order to win each badge you must accumulate points by successfully completing the course activities. You will contemplate Cervantes’s representations of universal values by analyzing dynamic visual scenarios and discussing a wide range of literary aspects of the novel, such as its themes, characters, metaphors, plots, and symbols.
title: Don Quijote de la Mancha: Amadis de Gaula
